data.eml:eml: Distribution of two species of Nephropsis Wood-Mason, 1872 (Crustacea, Decapoda, Nephropidae) from northeastern Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Alves-Júnior, Flavio De Almeida, Araújo, Marina De Sá Leitão Câmara De, Souza-Filho, Jesser F. (2016): Distribution of two species of Nephropsis Wood-Mason, 1872 (Crustacea, Decapoda, Nephropidae) from northeastern Brazil. Zootaxa 4114 (1), DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4114.1.8
